page.title: 01 An introduction to our area
page.content: Our area lies in the valley of the upper stretches of the{River Tay,} between the A9 and Pitlochry in the east and Aberfeldy and Loch Tay in the west.Driving through the area along the A827 gives one a view of some of the finest scenery in{Perthshire.} Mountain and river,heather moor and forest,grassland and arable land,can all be found in this area.This part of the country is also rich in history, from the earliest times up to more recent.Small hill farms and large estates still make up part of the scenery,while the remains of much older settlements can still be found. The pages that follow give a brief glimpse into life in{Grandtully}in the 1980's.
